entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 1,492,028,000 reported in the network role http://www.bekaert.com/xbrl/role/Consolidatedbalancesheet should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 1,492,022,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.bekaert.com/xbrl/role/Consolidatedstatementofchangesinequity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71/2020-12-31/ESEF/BE/0/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71-2020-12-31.zip/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71-2020-12-31/reports/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71-2020-12-31.xhtml 27734

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 0050 - Statement - Geconsolideerd kasstroomoverzicht but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:EffectOfExchangeRateChangesOnCashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 0040 - Statement - Geconsolideerd mutatieoverzicht van het eigen vermogen but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:DividendsPaid, ifrs-full:IssueOfEquity, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiariesThatDoNotResultInLossOfControl, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:Equity, bekb:IncreaseDecreaseThroughReclassifications, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughTreasuryShareTransactions, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions, bekb:IncreaseDecreaseThroughCapitalContributionByNonControllingInterests, ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncome, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesEquity All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 1,492,028,000 reported in the network role http://www.bekaert.com/xbrl/role/Geconsolideerdebalans should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 1,492,022,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.bekaert.com/xbrl/role/Geconsolideerdmutatieoverzichtvanheteigenvermogen. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71/2020-12-31/ESEF/BE/1/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71-2020-12-31.zip/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71-2020-12-31/reports/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71-2020-12-31.xhtml 27866
